p: The Agilent 6410 Triple Quad UPLC-MS/MS system (Agilent Technologies Inc., Lexington, MA) equipped with an Agilent 1290 UPLC system (Agilent Inc., Lexington, MA) consisting of a binary pump (G4220A), an autosampler (G4226A), a degasser (G1330B) and an automatic thermostatic column (G1316C) compartment was used for the experiments. All measurements were carried out with the mass spectrometer operated in positive electrospray ionization (ESI) mode. All data were processed using Agilent MassHunter Qualitative Analysis B.04.00 Software (Agilent Technologies Inc., Lexington, MA).
